nodes.bodyText: If the module is not defined -> If a module name is not specified

Instead of this switch case, you can use the existing API provided for converting a string log level value to a BLogLevel enum.
LOG_MANAGER.setModuleLogLevel(BLogLevel.toBLogLevel(level), module);
Can use an enum for this. See https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-distribution/pull/611/files for examples on how to use enums.
You don't need to say DEBUG = "DEBUG". Just DEBUG is enough. Only need to do so if you want to give a different string value to the enum value DEBUG
